lead_paragraph: BOB DOLE Speaking yesterday in Anaheim, Calif.: ''You know, sometimes, sometimes they make fun of us. They make fun of us and ridicule us for thinking about the past, and I know there are a lot of men and women right out here in this audience who've been in uniform, served their country, but I want to make this a special point. ''They don't put medals of honor in Post Toasties or Wheaties. You earn it the old-fashioned way. You risk your life, you're willing to lay down your life for your fellow man. This is courage! . . .
abstract: Text of campaign statement by Bob Dole in Anaheim, Calif
